title: OompaReviewLog
description: Review log written after each review round. File: runs/{swarm-id}/reviews/{worker-id}-c{N}-r{round}.json

round.description: Review round number (1-indexed, matches review-loop! attempt counter)

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 instant when the review completed

output.description: Full reviewer agent output (null if process failed before producing output)

diff-files.description: List of files in the diff that was reviewed
